entry.source: I want you to rescue a certain old man. He is{F801}being targeted by some unruly Hunters. He was{F801}the one that kept everyone together after the{F801}demons started appearing. We can't lose him!{F801}If you're going to help us, come to the overpass{F801}in {F804,5}Miyashita Park{F804,0} in Shibuya. Watch{F801}out for those Hunters on the way there.{F801}
